function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consensus on social distancing guidelines for family members and couples","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread within family units and couples","Mitigation":"Develop clear guidelines and educate the public on social distancing for family members and couples","Technologies":"Statistical analysis and tracking technology for monitoring social distancing violations","People":"Family members, couples, general public","Owner":"Health authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inaccurate measurement of inter-people distance due to controversial opinions","Impact":"Ineffective social distancing monitoring and increased risk of contagious disease spread","Mitigation":"Standardize the measurement criteria and guidelines for inter-people distance","Technologies":"Tracking technology, distance estimation algorithms","People":"Researchers, health authorities, public health organizations","Owner":"Research institutions, health authorities"},{"Description":"Unrecognized social distancing violations in risky zones","Impact":"Potential hotspots for contagious disease transmission and increased public health risk","Mitigation":"Implement couple detection and statistical analysis for identifying risky zones","Technologies":"Statistical analysis, tracking technology for couple detection","People":"General public, health authorities","Owner":"Public health organizations, technology developers"}]}
